channel.title: Will veterans get a special item to show they are veterans?
channel.description: i know i am asking for much, especially since i am basically getting the game for free, i just wanted to know if there's anything to show i am a vet. Thanks for answering BTW

item.title: Will veterans get a special item to show they are veterans?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Well, you get Alpha, Beta and Release – maybe we’ll do forum title later, but it’s manually done and 1700 manual titles is pretty intense we’ll try – but later
